item.title: Help ASAP if possible
item.dc:creator: @baez9 baez9
item.description:
@baez9 wrote:

Hi, I’m using a ddspeced source and i recently have added d claws. I have searched many tuts and never got any for Ddspeced. So i tried something and it got me the special bar but it hits like a dds and specs like a dds.

the code is the following:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 0x426); getHit(8); usingSpecial = true;

Anyway, i want the animation to be 2068 for the special but i can’t find how to do this, can anyone help me? Please.

Read full topic
